fixes.name: Days Between Policy Start and First Claim
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau DATEDIFF('day', MIN([StartDate]), MIN([ClaimDate])) to DAX. Reordered arguments to DAX DATEDIFF(start, end, interval) and converted column references to 'customers+'[ColumnName] format while preserving the MIN aggregations.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses aggregation functions (MIN), so it should be created as a measure.
